alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern DeSoto County through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walls, or near Horn Lake, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Walls, Lake Cormorant, Lynchburg, Alden, Twin Lakes, Bright, Nesbit, West Days, Lake View, Glover, Jago, Plum Point and Newport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
